StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEduca.onMajorByCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@Code varchar(2)) AS
SELECT -1 AS ID ,[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] AS Code ,[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_DESCRIPT] AS Descrip.on FROM [dbo].[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] = @Code
